itemDescription: Scottish-New Zealand carpenter, builder, station manager and harbourmaster

wikipedia_page.main: John Sinclair (18 September 1843 – 18 July 1925) was a notable New Zealand carpenter, builder, station manager and harbourmaster. He was born in Olrig, Caithness, Scotland in 1843.

response: John Sinclair may refer to:
